ud3.2:11.3: nopeti kalabhāgampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti →  na upeti, kalampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (sī1), na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (syā1-3, pā1)
ud3.2:12.3: bhagavati brahmacariye”ti → bhagavā brahmacariyeti (s1-3, pts1) | bhagavā brahmacariyanti (mr)
ud3.2:18.5: kho tvaṃ, nanda → kho te nanda (bj, s1-3, pts1) | kho nanda (mr)
